actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow a deduction for the purchase and installation of certain teletypewriters for use by individuals whose sight, hearing, or speech is impaired.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow an income tax deduction, not to exceed $200, for 50 percent of the cost of the purchase and installation of teletypewriters for use by individuals whose sight, hearing, or speech is impaired.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow a deduction for the purchase and installation of certain teletypewriters for use by individuals whose sight, hearing, or speech is impaired.
